name: WCMApp
short_description:
The purpose of this project is to help independent magazine/ newspaper/ publishers produce a mobile app so their readers can view the publisher's digital edition on the go.  
This project is intended to provide a template that is easily editable, and easy to implement for magazine/newspaper applications.  What iWebKit does for iPhone apps, this library does for mobile OS digital reader apps.  
This project contains all the code that went in to the Pegasus Media Inc. iOS app.  The only parts that have been left out are the proprietary information parts that cannot be open-sourced.
summary: iOS and mobile OS web app ui library
